New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored a team-high 29 points as the Oklahoma City Thunder won their franchise-record 13th consecutive regular-season game, 116-98 over the Los Angeles Clippers on January 3, 2025.
Key Match Events: The Thunder dominated all four quarters, with strong performances from multiple players including Jalen Williams and Isaiah Joe contributing significantly to the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Paycom Center in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, with an attendance of 18,203 fans.
